name: yieldr
description: Run functions and generator functions, and wrap result into a promise.

scripts.mocha:istanbul: node --harmony node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks test/
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.test-travis: npm run lint && npm run mocha:istanbul

author: Chris Yip
